ComicInfo.Summary:
A genius isn't allowed to be smart in the world of the future where everyone is equal.
Kenny Who? gets in trouble with the law.
A magician time-travels to the future to get a gun, but doesn't know how to aim it properly.
Micky Swift scales Food Mountains and meets the Jobfinder General who wants to interview him.
